Articles.Content:
Landed on ice cap and made my way to the main land with my first rover. =)

Pictures arnt as big as i cant access Imgur atm.

Im using the rover too look for new Easter eggs on Duna and other planets+moons.
Funny. I landed a rover on Duna today, too. So far it's driven 5km. It is schedule to make about 12-15km before its mission is over.

ATTACH=CONFIG]33343[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33344[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33345[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33346[/ATTACH]Well, whats REALLY weird, is i just sent a rover to the north pole. and in spirit of jeb, blew it up at the north.

EDIT: also got it to eve (will post on next post due to attachment limit.)
Awesome, good thing i didn't say first rover on Duna.
Here's my rover, been pretty useful for Duna exploration:

Awesome

I'm still yet have a proper play. what mod is it you used Grand Lander?
